Job Profile
 
 
 
1)  Maintenance of DG sets up to 750KVA.
 
2) Maintenance of UPS up to 120 KVA

6) Carrying all electrical Preventive Maintenance.
 
7) Attending all electrical Complaints.
 
8) Material Store keeping.
 
9) Maintenance & Rewinding of AC Motors up to 50HP.
 
10) Maintenance & control wiring of star delta panels.
 
 
 
 
My responsibilities  are
 
Ensure equipment health by daily Inspection as per checklists

abnormalities.

cost savings.
